fields.name: ID
fields.description: Identifier matching a primary record's 'ID' field. Used for joining metadata and distribution info.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Type of distribution or service endpoint. Examples: iiif_manifest, wms, download, etc.

fields.name: URL
fields.description: Fully qualified URL to a downloadable file, service, or documentation endpoint.

fields.name: Label
fields.description: Optional label or description of the distribution type, for display purposes.
